article_title: TB cases increase in U.S. for first time in 23 years
article_text:
Rising number of cases may signal resurgence of one of the world’s deadliest diseases

South Carolina saw a dramatic rise with a 32 percent increase year over year, in 2015

The disease is treatable with antibiotics, but the course can be long and complicated.

article_metadata.title: TB cases increase in U.S. for first time in 23 years | The State

og.description: The number of tuberculosis cases in the United States rose last year for the first time in nearly a quarter-century, according to a new report from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.
